item.title: The Placeholder Post
item.description: This post is purely filler. Please ignore it until I actually have something good to say.

item.title: About
item.description: Hello, and welcome to my website! My name is Keenan, and I’m a recent Colorado School of Mines alum (B.S. in Computer Science with a focus in Computer Engineering, 2024) living in Golden, Colorado. I am a Software Engineer Intern at ICR, Inc. and an incoming student at the University of Washington (M.S. in Information Management with a focus in Program/Product Management & Consulting, 2025). Previously, I worked at Datava.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Quick Links Here are the easiest ways to reach me, listed in order of how quickly you can expect to receive a response: Email: keenanmschott28 [at] gmail [dot] com School Email: kschott [at] uw [dot] edu LinkedIn DMs: https://www.linkedin.com/in/keenanschott

item.title: Portfolio
item.description: Note This page is my extended Curriculum Vitae containing all my professional achievements. For a more concise overview, please view my resume. I'm an aspiring software engineer, product manager, and consultant. I have two internship experiences as a software engineer, and I have worked as a teaching and research assistant in computer science and human-robot interaction, respectively. Experience ¶ Software Engineer Intern ¶ May 2024 - Present ICR, Inc. Key Technologies: React, TypeScript, Ollama
